descriptionHtml:
This Mod adds some adult animations using dildo.

Required :
- SKSE v1.07.03
- FNIS v6.3
- Mfg Console
- XPMS or XPMSE
- Microsoft Visual C++ 2012 Redistributable (x86)

Recommend :
- HDT Physics Extensions
- HDT vagina collision body

Install :
1. install this mod files
2. Run FNIS.exe

How to use dildo :
1. player.Additem xx00535f 1 or Alchemy bench : gaiant toe and skeever tail and salt -> dildo Misc item
2. Drop from inventory
3. Activate it(If you want to your teammate to do it, direct her to activate)
4. Start play
If sneaking activate, you will get it without animation. These animations are played female player character and female player teammate. However, player and teammate whose conditions are not satisfied will not be played. It may be pretty harsh conditions but my PC was played.

How to use soulgem :
1. Sneaking activate soulgem(filled) on the ground
2. Effect display(If follower, nothing this)
3. Wait 10 seconds
4. Start play
The animation will be played when they are feeling stressed.

How to use tentacle :
1. Take stressed(PC or followers)
2. Resolve stress(using dildo or soulgem)
3. The PC receive a letter when resolved stress several times
4. The PC does things what is written in the letter(taken stress)
5. The PC will get the true Shokushu(tentacle)
6. The PC can resolve stress using it(They will be able to use it when under stress)
You need to get tentacle jar and enabled boobs feature if you'd like to use tectacle. The letter will not send the PC and animation will not be worked if they are no stress, or disabled boobs feature.

Boobs feature :
When they are entered combat, their boobs size will change.
If you'd like to change boobs size :
HAnimations.ini
"fBoobsSizeMagnitude" -> PC's boobs size
"fBoobsSizeMagnitudeFollowers" -> followers' boobs size
- Size Condition
if (0.0f < boobsSize && 1.0f > boobsSize)
return boobs will change small;
else if (1.0f < boobsSize)
return boobs will change big;
else
return what's it?!
e.g "iMaxBoobsStress=10"
Boobs changes in 10 steps.

Key control :
"NUM8" speed up, "NUM2" speed down, "NUM4" Previous animation, "NUM6" next animation, "NUM0" return neutral animation, "NUM." fnish, "NUM enter" OK.
You can set unequip items and HDT collision and key bind setting by editing SKSE/Plugins/HAnimations.ini.

Credit :
Thanks to
SKSE by SKSE team
SKSE plugin library by himika
FNIS by fore
Mfg Console by kapaer
HDT Physics Extensions by HydrogensaysHDT
XPMS by xp32
XPMSE by Groovtama
Skin animation tutorial by cotyounoyume
author: nazonootoko
